descriptionHtml:
Hi, everybody. This is my first ever Skyrim dungeon. Here is a short description:

-It has English and French version.

-It is located just west of Riverwood.

-It is using leveled enemies to provide 'balanced and fun' experience at any player level.

-It is of medium difficulty, suitable for Skyrim veterans and beginners alike.

-It should provide around 45 to 60 minutes of gameplay.

-Feel free to rate and comment. Also, I am very interested to know if this dungeon feels like something that Bethesda could have shipped with the original game. Thanks.


This mod has been cleaned with TES5Edit tool. Let me know if you experience any problems or crashing. And if you liked it, feel free to rate and comment.


NOTE: If you liked this dungeon mod, feel free to check out my other 2 dungeons:
-Windcaller's Pass.
-Engelmann's Rest.


This is an excellent preview video, done by Brodual:
[youtube]v1VFgt6ArFA[/youtube]
author: Predrag Pesic
